Comments_List: I learned a great deal about what computer science research is (which was something I was unsure of before) and got experience working on a topic that I knew nothing about previously.

There was not nearly enough guidance on the research projects. I would have liked to have spent more time with the professor learning more about the extent of the project and how I could be of greater use. However, since I was not at all knowledgeable about the content, I seriously struggled to produce any sort of viable project by the end of the semester.

I think that this course would be excellent if you were working with a professor on content that you are incredibly passionate and well-versed in. Otherwise, it is a stressful and confusing portion of your coursework.
